message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product and I think it would be a great fit for you. I'm offering it to you for $11,500. What do you think?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. I'm interested in purchasing it, but I can only afford to pay $11,000 at this time.
Bob, I appreciate your offer but I'm looking for a price closer to $11,250.  This product is really worth it and I think you'll be very happy with it. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I understand your position, Alice. I'm still looking for a price closer to $11,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value of the product. Could we possibly meet somewhere in between?
